feed.title: Google Cloud: Service Extensions
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Service Extensions

entry.title: Feature
entry.content: [Plugins for Cloud Load Balancing](https://cloud.google.com/service-extensions/docs/overview#integration-lb-plugins) help you insert WebAssembly (Wasm) code in a fully managed serverless environment directly into the data path of most Cloud Load Balancing Application Load Balancers. This feature is in **General Availability**.

entry.title: Feature
entry.content:
[Edge extensions](https://cloud.google.com/service-extensions/docs/lb-extensions-overview#edge-extensions) help you manipulate request headers early in the request processing lifecycle of global external Application Load Balancers to influence caching and routing decisions. This feature is in **Preview**.
Learn how to [configure an edge extension](https://cloud.google.com/service-extensions/docs/configure-edge-extensions).
